layman_description: A large metal fuel barrel that holds explosives and drops loot when destroyed.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelGenericSingle00 with explosions that trigger particle effects during destruction.
player_impact: Breaking it yields fuel barrel loot and creates dangerous explosions that damage nearby players.

layman_description: Another large metal fuel barrel variant positioned differently for environmental variety.
technical_description: Similar to QuadA but with distinct particle index 67 for visual variation in explosions.
player_impact: Provides fuel loot when looted or destroyed with comparable explosion danger to other barrels.

layman_description: A single metal fuel barrel that can be scavenged for gasoline and fuel materials.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelMetalMaster with specific particle effects and display ordering for placement flexibility.
player_impact: Breaking it provides fuel resources essential for crafting and vehicle maintenance.

layman_description: A rotated version of the basic fuel barrel for different angles and spatial arrangement.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelGenericSingle00 with rotated model orientation and particle index 65.
player_impact: Offers the same fuel loot as other barrels but positioned at 45-degree angle for building variety.

layman_description: The base template for all metal fuel barrels with standard explosion and loot behavior.
technical_description: Master class defining shared properties for all metal barrels including explosion particles and loot lists.
player_impact: Provides fuel loot when broken and creates explosions that can chain-react with nearby barrels.

layman_description: A large dark oil barrel variant that drops large amounts of fuel when looted.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelOilSingle00 with specific coloring and particle effect 70 for visual distinction.
player_impact: Breaking yields large fuel barrel loot that's valuable for powering vehicles and machines.

layman_description: Another large oil barrel positioned differently from QuadA for terrain variation.
technical_description: Similar to QuadA with particle index 71 and identical loot but different placement orientation.
player_impact: Provides equivalent fuel resources as QuadA when destroyed or looted.

layman_description: A single dark oil barrel found in industrial areas yielding fuel resources.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelMetalMaster with specific coloring and particle effect configuration.
player_impact: Breakable barrel providing fuel loot in industrial zones and structures.

layman_description: A rotated oil barrel variant matching the basic barrel but with different orientation.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelOilSingle00 with 45-degree rotation and particle index 69.
player_impact: Offers identical fuel loot to other oil barrels with rotational placement variety.

layman_description: A large plastic barrel found in urban and industrial areas for resource collection.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelPlasticSingle00 with positioning for multi-barrel groupings.
player_impact: Scavengeable container providing fuel and industrial materials when broken.

layman_description: Another plastic barrel variant offering the same resources as QuadA with different placement.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelPlasticSingle00 with alternate positioning and ordering configuration.
player_impact: Provides identical fuel loot to other plastic barrels when looted or destroyed.

layman_description: A single plastic barrel that players can break open to collect fuel and materials.
technical_description: Base plastic barrel with ModelEntity shape allowing water flow and multi-directional placement.
player_impact: Common loot container providing fuel resources throughout the game world.

layman_description: A plastic barrel rotated 45 degrees for varied environmental arrangement.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelPlasticSingle00 with rotational variant for building flexibility.
player_impact: Scavengeable barrel at different angle providing same fuel loot as other variants.

layman_description: The foundational template for all plastic barrel variants with shared explosion and loot behavior.
technical_description: Master class defining properties for plastic barrels including explosion effects and water flow settings.
player_impact: Provides fuel loot when destroyed and can create chain explosions in tight barrel groupings.

layman_description: A large radioactive barrel that contaminates the surrounding area with radiation hazard.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelRadiatedSingle00 with radiation effect radius of 2.5 units and particle index 74.
player_impact: Breaking it yields fuel but exposes players to radiation sickness until healed.

layman_description: Another radioactive barrel variant positioned differently from QuadA.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelRadiatedSingle00 with particle index 75 and identical radiation settings.
player_impact: Provides fuel loot with radiation hazard equivalent to other radioactive barrel variants.

layman_description: A single barrel emitting radiation that damages health unless player takes protective measures.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelMetalMaster with active radius radiation effect applying buffRadiation01.
player_impact: Dangerous to break without rad away; provides fuel but applies radiation sickness status.

layman_description: A rotated radioactive barrel at 45-degree angle with identical radiation hazard.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelRadiatedSingle00 with rotation variant and particle index 73.
player_impact: Scavengeable with same radiation hazard and fuel yield as other radioactive barrels.

layman_description: A large pale metal barrel found in various locations yielding standard fuel loot.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelWhiteSingle00 with light coloring and particle effect index 78.
player_impact: Breaking yields fuel resources with no special hazards or status effects.

layman_description: Another large pale barrel positioned differently from QuadA for building variation.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelWhiteSingle00 with particle index 79 and matching light coloring.
player_impact: Provides equivalent fuel loot to other white barrel variants when destroyed.

layman_description: A single pale metal barrel commonly found containing basic fuel resources.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelMetalMaster with light tint coloring and particle effect index 76.
player_impact: Standard breakable barrel providing fuel materials without hazards.

layman_description: A rotated pale barrel matching the standard version but positioned at an angle.
technical_description: Extends cntBarrelWhiteSingle00 with 45-degree orientation and particle index 77.
player_impact: Offers identical fuel loot to other white barrels with rotational arrangement variation.

layman_description: An empty bathtub found in houses where players might discover hidden items.
